code: import dater from"../../data/readingData/data.json";export function filterCompletedTexts(){var completedData=JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem("readingExerciseData"))||[];return dater.filter(function(text){return!completedData.some(function(data){return data.text===text.text;});});}export function filterTextsByLength(score){var maxLength=score<10?100:score<17?250:Infinity;var minLength=score<10?0:score<17?101:251;return filterCompletedTexts().filter(function(data){return data.text.length>=minLength&&data.text.length<=maxLength;});}export function getRandomData(score){var data=filterTextsByLength(score);return data.length>0?data[Math.floor(Math.random()*data.length)]:null;}export function saveExerciseData(text,questions,answers,percentage){var data=JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem("readingExerciseData"))||[];var newData={text:text,questions:questions,answers:answers,percentage:percentage};data.push(newData);window.localStorage.setItem("readingExerciseData",JSON.stringify(data));}export function resetExerciseData(){window.localStorage.removeItem("readingExerciseData");}
